name: Digzy the Sheepdog
description:
Digzy the sheepdog is an action-strategy game for animal lovers. The goal is to control Digzy to herd 3 sheep through a series of challenges so that they can return to their sheep stall safely. There are 20 levels starting from the easiest to the hardest.

Features

  • 45 - 60 mins of playtime.
  • Control Digzy the sheep dog.
  • Rescue 3  white and black sheep.
  • Avoid furious donkeys,  deadly mushrooms and striking spikes
  • Collect items to solve various challenges

The big idea behind the game is about project management skill through gamification.  Player has to analyse  the  environment, understand the team members, balance the constraints and plan steps to get things done through the others. There will be some expected and unexpected challenges to overcome. 

We are offering the beta version for free. You can play it all the way from beginning to the end.  However, you can also purchase the paid version which will have the function that allow the player to select level directly. The price is just USD 2.00 .

Thank you for playing
